sentence.text: The JU-negative regulation of endopeptidase activity cells have a sub-tetraploid karyotype including the 1;10 chromosomal translocation and amplification of the proximal end of 3p; these features are considered genetic signatures of myxoinflammatory fibroblastic sarcoma.

Both the primary tumor and the JU-negative regulation of endopeptidase activity cells showed nuclear expression of the positive regulation of cell adhesion transcription factor but TFE3-activating chromosomal rearrangements were not found.
To our knowledge, JU-negative regulation of endopeptidase activity is the first established myxoinflammatory fibroblastic sarcoma cell line.
